item.description:
Join me after work for a quick drink at The Barking Crab at the outside bar!

I'll probably get there between 5:15ish / 5:30ish and I'll stay for a couple of hours. Feel free to come and go as you please.

There will be no group tab because people will be arriving and leaving at different times. Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go.

I'll wear a GREEN shirt. I'm asking EVERYONE to wear something GREEN. That way, it'll be easier to find the group since we'll all be wearing the same color.

Check out The Barking Crab's website for directions and more info:

http://www.barkingcra...

This event is on .... rain or shine!

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a GREEN shirt. I'm asking everyone to wear a GREEN shirt. So, look for the group with the GREEN clothing! I'll be at the outside bar.
item.why: To have a drink after work.
item.name: Outside Bar at The Barking Crab - Wear GREEN!!!
